jd: From: Shivamanish, Talentgroups shivamanish.b@talentgroups.com Reply to: shivamanish.b@talentgroups.com This is Shiva Manish I have an excellent job opportunity with one of our premier clients. Since it is an urgent business requirement your prompt response is appreciated.Senior .NET Developer With BlazorRemote Experience: 10+ Years Job Description: We are seeking a Senior .NET Developer with extensive experience in Angular, Blazor, SQL, and Azure to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining high-performance web applications. This role requires a deep understanding of front-end and back-end technologies, cloud services, and modern web frameworks. Key Responsibilities:• Design and develop applications using .NET Core, Blazor, and Angular.• Develop and optimize SQL databases to ensure efficient data management.• Implement cloud solutions using Azure, including services like Azure Functions, App Services, and Storage.• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions.• Perform code reviews, optimize performance, and ensure best practices are followed. Qualifications:• 10+ years of experience in .NET development (C#, .NET Core, Blazor).• Strong expertise in Angular (latest versions) for front-end development.• Solid experience with SQL database design and optimization.• Proficiency with Microsoft Azure services (App Services, Azure DevOps, etc.).• Excellent problem-solving skills and ability to work in a fast-paced environment.
